page.title: 01Summary of area as a whole.
page.content: Our area covers the Pitsea,Barstable and Vange districts of Basildon.In these areas there is much New Town housing.Bowers Gifford is also included in our grid reference. Although this comes within Basildon district it is not designated for New Town development. There are several neighbourhood shopping areas,but the major shopping centre in our block is in Pitsea where there is a large superstore and an open market is held twice a week. A country park lies to the south of the block and there ara also several other areas of open space.There is much grazing and farmland to the south and east of the area. A small area of warehousing and untidy industry is situated south of Pitsea Railway station.
